article_text:
More than a dozen children were injured Sunday afternoon when a carnival ride malfunctioned at a festival in Norwalk, Conn.

A swing ride in the Kids Cove section of the city's Oyster Festival stopped short while in motion, causing 13 kids to "forcefully fall to the ground," according to the Norwalk Police Department. None of the injuries were life threatening, but at least two children suffered bleeding from their heads,...

More than a dozen children were injured Sunday afternoon when a carnival ride malfunctioned at a festival in Norwalk, Conn.A swing ride in the Kids Cove section of the city's Oyster Festival stopped short while in motion, causing 13 kids to "forcefully fall to the ground," according to the Norwalk Police Department.
